CustomField.formula: ROUND( Quote_Subtotal__c + Total_Estimated_Installation_Costs__c + IF( NOT(AND( ISPICKVAL(Finance_Partner__c, ""), ISBLANK(Finance_Partner_Account__c) )), Competitor_Buyout_Amount__c, 0 ) + IF( !ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_NEW__c), Sales_Tax__c + IF( Shipping_and_Handling__c != 99999.99, Shipping_and_Handling__c + X3rd_Party_Products_Services__c, 0 ) - IF( NOT(AND( ISPICKVAL(Finance_Partner__c, ""), ISBLANK(Finance_Partner_Account__c) )), Buyout_Sales_Tax__c, 0 ), 0 ), 2 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total amount (TCV) that will be owed by a customer, inclusive of all sales tax and shipping and handling.
CustomField.label: Balance Due
